  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private int assertCountIntersections​(Camera cam, Intersectable geo)
    Test helper function to count the intersections and compare with expected value
    void constructRayThroughPixelPlaneTest1()
    test plane 1: constructRayThroughPixel(int,int,int,int,double,double,double) + findIntersections (ray) every pixel send ray that create intersect point - 1*9 = 9 the plane is orthogonal to the view plane
    void constructRayThroughPixelPlaneTest2()
    test plane 2: constructRayThroughPixel(int,int,int,int,double,double,double) + findIntersections (ray) every pixel send ray that create intersect point - 1*9 = 9
    void constructRayThroughPixelPlaneTest3()
    test plane 3: constructRayThroughPixel(int,int,int,int,double,double,double) + findIntersections (ray) from two rows: pixel send ray that create intersect point - 1*6 = 9
    void constructRayThroughPixelSphereTest1()
    test sphere 1: constructRayThroughPixel(int,int,int,int,double,double,double) + findIntersections (ray) the central pixel send ray that create 2 intersect points
    void constructRayThroughPixelSphereTest2()
    test sphere 2: constructRayThroughPixel(int,int,int,int,double,double,double) + findIntersections (ray) every pixel send ray that create 2 intersect points - 2*9 = 18
    void constructRayThroughPixelSphereTest3()
    test sphere 3: constructRayThroughPixel(int,int,int,int,double,double,double) + findIntersections (ray) 5 pixels (like cross in the grid) send ray that create 2 intersect points - 2*5 = 10
    void constructRayThroughPixelSphereTest4()
    test sphere 4: constructRayThroughPixel(int,int,int,int,double,double,double) + findIntersections (ray) every pixel send ray that create 1 intersect point, because of the sphere included the plane view - 9*1 = 9
    void constructRayThroughPixelSphereTest5()
    test sphere 5: constructRayThroughPixel(int,int,int,int,double,double,double) + findIntersections (ray) the sphere is behind the view plane - no intersects
    void constructRayThroughPixelTriangleTest1()
    test triangle 1: constructRayThroughPixel(int,int,int,int,double,double,double) + findIntersections (ray) the central pixel send ray that create 1 intersect point
    void constructRayThroughPixelTriangleTest2()
    test triangle 2: constructRayThroughPixel(int,int,int,int,double,double,double) + findIntersections (ray) the central pixel and the pixel above it send ray that create 1 intersect point - 1*2 = 2

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • assertCountIntersections

      private int assertCountIntersections​(Camera cam, Intersectable geo)
      Test helper function to count the intersections and compare with expected value
      Parameters:
      cam - - camera for the test
      geo - - 3D body to test the integration of the camera with
      Returns:
      expected value

      public void constructRayThroughPixelSphereTest3()
      test sphere 3: constructRayThroughPixel(int,int,int,int,double,double,double) + findIntersections (ray) 5 pixels (like cross in the grid) send ray that create 2 intersect points - 2*5 = 10

      public void constructRayThroughPixelSphereTest4()
      test sphere 4: constructRayThroughPixel(int,int,int,int,double,double,double) + findIntersections (ray) every pixel send ray that create 1 intersect point, because of the sphere included the plane view - 9*1 = 9

      public void constructRayThroughPixelSphereTest5()
